mapper.select: SELECT SUM(abs(amount)) total FROM tb_record_detail t1 where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t1.record_type = #{recordType} and date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{date}, '%Y-%m') and t1.delete_time is null

SELECT t1.record_category, SUM( abs( t1.amount ) ) total FROM tb_record_detail t1 WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t1.record_type = #{recordType} AND date_format( t1.occur_time, '%Y' ) = date_format(#{date}, '%Y') AND t1.delete_time IS NULL GROUP BY t1.record_category ORDER BY total DESC

select t1.*, t2.name recordAccountName from tb_record_detail t1 left join tb_record_account t2 on t1.record_account_id = t2.id where t1.user_id = #{userId} and t1.recoverable_status = #{recoverableStatus} and t1.delete_time is null ORDER BY t1.occur_time desc

SELECT sum( amount ) total, date_format( t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m' ) occur_month FROM tb_record_detail t1 WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t1.record_type = #{recordType} AND date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') >= date_format(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m') AND date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') > date_format(t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m') AND t1.delete_time IS NULL GROUP BY occur_month ORDER BY date_format( t1.occur_time, '%Y-%m' ) ASC

SELECT record_book_id, SUM( amount ) AS amount_total FROM tb_record_detail WHERE delete_time IS NULL -- 排除账户间流转的类型 AND record_type = #{recordTypeId} AND record_book_id IN #{item, jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY record_book_id
